pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru
noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru
noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

lessons.japanese: 議案は圧倒的多数で可決された。
lessons.english: The bill was passed by an overwhelming majority.

lessons.japanese: 圧倒的多数がその残酷な刑罰を廃止することに票を投じた。
lessons.english: An overwhelming majority voted to abolish the brutal punishment.

lessons.japanese: 初めから果敢に前へ出て圧倒し、体勢を崩した相手を押し出した。
lessons.english: He resolutely pushed forward from the start, overwhelming and pushing out his off-balance opponent.

lessons.japanese: 零細なパン屋はスーパーマーケットに圧倒された。
lessons.english: Mom-and-pop bakeries were overwhelmed by supermarkets.

lessons.japanese: 彼らは圧倒的に優勢な敵と戦っていた。
lessons.english: They were attacking against overwhelming odds.

lessons.japanese: 彼は彼女の愛情の強さに圧倒された。
lessons.english: He was overwhelmed by the intensity of her love.

lessons.japanese: 彼に会うたびごとに、彼の頭の良さに圧倒された。
lessons.english: Every time I saw him, I was overcome with his brilliance.

lessons.japanese: 私たちの行動の圧倒的な部分は学んで身についたものだ。
lessons.english: An overwhelming part of our behavior is learned.

lessons.japanese: 議案は圧倒的多数で可決された。
lessons.english: The bill was passed by an overwhelming majority.

lessons.japanese: 圧倒的多数がその残酷な刑罰を廃止することに票を投じた。
lessons.english: An overwhelming majority voted to abolish the brutal punishment.

lessons.japanese: 私たちの行動の圧倒的な部分は学んで身についたものだ。
lessons.english: An overwhelming part of our behavior is learned.
